phrases: Geez, you must be such a handful for Alicia.
She said My, my, and giggled.
She said My, my, and giggled.
is what you would expect from Alicia, right?
No, what she should have said was, Hey, hey.
Sir, I would like these, please.
Athena, you forgot to take what you bought!
Why are you always like this, Athena?
Akari, I got scolded by my mother again.
Ai, I get scolded by Aika a lot, too.
I know she scolds me because she cares about me, but...
I wish I did not have to get scolded at all!
...I wish I did not have to get scolded at all!
Do you remember that day Oboeteimasuka ano hi o
When your heart suddenly began to race Futo kanjita tokimeki o
The rays from the blue sky were pouring over you...
I could not look away, and when our eyes met Mitoreru to me ga atte
I could not help but smile Egao koboreta
It is just like a spiral Marude supiraare
I want to spend my days waving to you Itsumademo te o furitai hibi
This is my proof that I was here with you Koko ni tashika ni kimi to ita akashi
There is a path which stretches on ahead Kono saki mo tsuzuiteru michi ga aru
When you climb the next hill, Tsugi no saka o nobottara
Let us meet again Mata aimashou
A-Are you helping me practice, President Aria?
This is strength training, is not it?
This is visual acuity training, is not it?
This is balance training, is not it?
You are going to get scolded by Alicia if you keep this up, you know.
Um, Akari, how does Alicia scold you?
Now that you mention it, I do not think I have ever seen her get angry, either.
Knowing Alicia, there is no way she would scold someone...
After all, this is Alicia we are talking about!
She truly is a water fairy descended from the heavens!
But, come to think of it, I have never seen Athena scold you either, Alice.
I may scold clumsy Athena at times, but I never get scolded myself.
Well, I guess that makes sense.
Even I am forced to scold Athena sometimes,
so it is really a mystery why Alicia does not scold Akari.
I was about to really make a loud noise there.
There must be times when she is irritated or angry, when no one's around.
Besides, if she truly cares about Akari, she should scold her properly.
Besides, if she truly cares about Akari, she should scold her properly.
Besides, if she truly cares about Akari, she should scold her properly.
Since the members of the Aria Company always treat me so well,
I thought I would secretly return the favor by helping out with the cleaning.
What are you doing up there?
I woke up early, so I thought I would come by and say hello before going to school.
My customer had another commitment, so I finished early today.
Why do not we all have some tea together?
I get to have tea with Alicia!
I am happy for you, Aika-
I-I am so sorry, President Aria.
Are you all right, President Aria?
Come to think of it, where is Alice?
She said she had something to do today, and went home.
I thought you had something to do?
I-I finished early and had a hunch that there might be a tea party with Alicia, so I came back.
I was right, was not I?
W-W-W-W-What am I going to do?!
My, my, what was that sound?
My, my, what was that sound?
I will help clean it up....none of you were hurt.
I will help clean it up.
My, my, it is all right.
Again, she did not scold her.
My, my, it is all right.
Again, she did not scold her.
Akari's gondola is drifting out to sea!
This is all because you did not tie the rope properly!
This is a really good chance to see her get mad!
This is a really big mistake.
Even Alicia will have no choice but to scold Akari for this.
It looks like the mooring rope was hit and severed by something sharp.
It is all thanks to President Aria for noticing it right away.
Thank you so much, President Aria!
Come now, let us all finally have some tea.
Just what you would expect from Alicia!
Akira would have just jumped to conclusions and yelled, Hey Aika!
She really was calm, was not she?
Surely she would have scolded her... right?
It is been a week since then.
I have been unable to find any clues to reveal what Alicia is thinking.
Maybe Akari making a really big mistake is the only way to find out, after all?
This is to replenish the blood sugar in my brain, so I can come up with a much better plan!
Are you on your way home from school?
Would you mind if we join you?
Has she figured out that I have secretly been observing her?
Naughty troublemakers who snoop on other people from the shadows...
I-I am really in a pinch!!
Could this be the first time we have ever been alone together?
Is not it strange, considering how long we have known each other?
So Alice, is there something you would like to ask me?
You have been watching me a lot lately, have not you?
You were looking at me so intently, it made me a little self-conscious.
Giggle I knew it, she saw right threw me!
Um... Alicia, why do not you scold people?
She said that she is never seen you be angry.
I was wondering why that is.
You never scold your apprentice, no matter how grave a mistake she makes?
If that is true, do not you think you are being a bit cold?
Could you please go give this to that little girl sitting over there?
Mr. Cat, is this candy for me?
The errand was a big success!
That girl is really happy, too.
Now this time, go to the boy sitting at the next table.
That was much quicker than before!
Alice, why do not join me for a walk after you finish your parfait?
His first try took a while, did not it?
Why did not you point out his mistakes, like when he got sidetracked or went to the wrong table?
I would not shout, Not that way, not that way!
I would keep shouting, This way, this way!
If I kept shouting, not that way, President Aria would become afraid of making mistakes.
Eventually, I do not think he would be able to move.
That is my way of doing things.
What would you do if he kept on making mistakes, though?
If that happened, I would reflect on my own lack of knowledge alongside him.
After all, I am just an imperfect human being.
As a mentor, when you instruct your apprentice...
When that happens, I often think to myself,
Ah, teaching and being taught are, in fact, very much alike.
So, in that case, all I can do is try to see things from Akari's point of view.
I will share her challenges, share her defeats...
And, in the very end, I hope to share her happiness as well.
It is one coincidence after another today, is not it?
President Aria, I was wondering where you went, and here you are with Alicia!
We were also wondering where Junior could be, since she was late for practice...
Alice, please keep the conversation we had just now between us, okay?
I do not see any point in keeping it a secret.
The two of you are so alike, I get embarrassed just watching you both.
That was really disrespectful of me.
I wish my mother was like Alicia.
But then my mother would not be herself, would she?
A shore awash in golden waves Kin no nami kishibe ni
Filled with yearning, I open my eyes and it is morning Akogare mezameru no asa ni
As my thoughts focus intently on someone, Dareka no koto o tsuyoku omou toki
Love rests on my palm, held high Kakageta te no hira ni ai ga tomaru
A future guided by the flow of water and wind Mizu no yukue to kaze ga shimesu mirai
I gaze at the hope that surrounds this world Kono hoshi o tsusumu kibou mitsumete
The distant clouds of light are beckoning now Tooi kumo hikari ga sasou you ni yureru i am about to
A shore awash in golden waves Kin no nami kishibe ni
Filled with yearning, I open my eyes and it is morning Akogare mezameru no asa ni
